Event.Message: Your computer has lost the lease to its IP address %1 on the Network Card with network address %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGUID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not able to renew its address from the network (from the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in stopping the Dhcpv6 client service. ErrorCode is %1.ShutDown Flag value is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer has detected that the IP address %1 for the Network Card with network address %3 is already in use on the network. Your computer will automatically attempt to obtain a different address.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGUID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Router Advertisement settings have been changed on the network adapter %1. The current M - Managed Address Configuration flag is %2 and the O - Other Stateful Configuration flag is %3. User Action: If you are seeing this event frequently, then it could be due to frequent change in M and O flag settings on the router in the network. Please contact your network administrator to have it resolved.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flag1" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="Flag2" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in initializing the interface. The error code is: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: MAC Address %2 in DUID %4 could not be found in the system. Generated new DUID %8 based on MAC address %6.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="DUIDLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DUID" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="DUIDLength"/> <data name="NewHWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewHWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="NewHWLength"/> <data name="NewDUIDLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewDUID" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="NewDUIDLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv6 has found SSID %1 in the cached networks for interface %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv6 found a valid IPv6 address %1 and options in the cache for network SSID %2 under interface %4. DHCPv6 will use this cached configuration.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address1" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv6 found options in the cache for network %1 under interface %4. DHCPv6 will use this cached configuration.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv6 client found expired cached configuration for network %1 under interface %3. DHCPv6 client will discard the expired configuration and obtain new configuration from DHCPv6 server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: A network error occurred when trying to send a message. The error code is: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempting to acquire a reference for interface %1. Error code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempting to release the reference for interface %1. Error code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Connect notification has been received on interface with interface id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Disconnect notification has been received on interface with interface id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Confirm-Reply is initiated on the interface with Interface Id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Solicit-Advertise-Request-Reply is initiated on the interface with Interface Id %1. Managed Flag value %2 OtherConfig Flag value %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Solicit is sent from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Advertise is received from the interface %1. Status code is %2. Offered Address is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: Advertise is discarded from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Request is sent from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for request from the interface %1. Status code is %2. Received address is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: Incorrect reply is received for request from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Renew is sent on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for renew from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An invalid reply is received for renew from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Rebind is sent on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for rebind from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An invalid reply is received for rebind from the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Release is sent on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Decline is sent on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for decline on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An invalid reply is received for decline on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Confirm is sent on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for confirm on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An invalid reply is received for confirm on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Info-request is sent on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid reply is received for Info-request on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An invalid reply is received for Info-request on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in creation of packet on the interface %1. Error code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in extracting options from the message received on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is changed from stateful to stateless mode on the interface %1. Status Code is %2. Managed Flag value %3 OtherConfig Flag value %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Dword1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Dword2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is changed from stateless to stateful mode on the interface %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is changed from nondhcp to stateful mode on the interface %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is changed from nondhcp to stateless mode on the interface %1. Status Code is %2. Managed Flag value %3 OtherConfig Flag value %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Dword1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Dword2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is converted to static mode on the interface %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in parsing the DHCP message received on the interface id %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Information refresh time option is received in the interface %1 with a refresh time value of %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RefreshTime" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The information refresh time has expired, hence triggering a new inform packet on the interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 is plumbed on the interface %2. Status Code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 is unplumbed on the interface %2. Status Code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An interface is added whose interface index is %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in initializing the interface %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in plumbing the parameters into stack. Status Code is %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv6 client service is started
DHCPv6 client service is stopped. ShutDown Flag value is %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in opening the socket on the interface %1. Error Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in closing the socket on the interface %1. Error Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DNS registration has happened for the interface %1. Status Code is %2.DNS Flag settings is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Dword" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DNS deregistration has happened for the interface %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv6 client service stop is almost done.DHCP Context Ref count is %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is changed from stateful to stateful mode on the interface %1. Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Message is Invalid and it is discarded.
The Class ID %1 was set for the interface %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGUID" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 being plumbed for adapter %2 already exists
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not assigned an address from the network (by the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %1 is exempted on interface %2. Error code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %1 is closed on interface %2. Error code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is changing mode to %2 on the interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewMode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Regular address acquisition will be done on interface %1 because aggressive address acquisition is turned ON.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv6 address acquisition cycle after %1 SOLICIT transmissions on interface %2 because the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the DHCP IPv4 address %3. Managed Flag value %4 OtherConfig Flag value %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal3" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv6 address acquisition cycle after %1 SOLICIT transmissions on interface %2 because the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the static IPv4 address %3. Managed Flag value %4 OtherConfig Flag value %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal3" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP will not try regular IPv6 address acquisition on interface %1 since the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the IPv4 address %2. Managed Flag value %3 OtherConfig Flag value %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP will try regular IPv6 address acquisition on interface %1 even though the machine is in Connected Standby state since the interface has no IPv4 or IPv6 address. Managed Flag value %2 OtherConfig Flag value %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %2 exemption triggered on interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %2 close triggered on interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The DHCPv6 client received connected standby entry notification.
The DHCPv6 client received connected standby exit notification.

DHCP will try regular IPv6 address acquisition on interface %1 due to registry settings even though the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has an IPv4 address. Managed Flag value %2 OtherConfig Flag value %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is enabled on the interface %1. Status code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP is disabled on the interface %1. Status code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP transaction will not be attempted on interface %1 because DHCP is disabled on it.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv6 address acquisition cycle after %1 SOLICIT transmissions on interface %2 because the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the static IPv6 address %3. Managed Flag value %4 OtherConfig Flag value %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal3" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv6 address acquisition cycle after %1 SOLICIT transmissions on interface %2 because the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the stateless IPv6 address %3. Managed Flag value %4 OtherConfig Flag value %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal3" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv6 address acquisition on interface %1 because the interface is not multicast enabled.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The values of flags received on interface %1 are: Managed Flag value %2 OtherConfig Flag value %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPSOLICIT): Offer is accepted on the IPv6 interface %2. Offered Address is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCINFORMATIONREQUEST): Options received on the IPv6 interface %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv6): Media Connect on interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv6): End of Media Connect on interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
